panels.description: Количество активных виртуальных пользователей за интервал времени (10с).
panels.title: Action Users (Scenarios)

panels.description: Общее количество активных пользователей за интервал времени (10с).

targets.query: SELECT mean("active") FROM "gatling.users" WHERE ("scenario"::tag =~ /.*${system}.*/ AND "loadGenerator"::tag =~ /^$load_generator$/ AND "scenario"::tag != 'allUsers') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

panels.title: Total Action Users

targets.query:
SELECT 100 * sum("ok") / sum("all")
FROM 
    (SELECT sum("count") as "all" FROM "gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'all' AND "request" =~ /.*${system}*./ AND "loadGenerator"::tag =~ /^$load_generator$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)),
    (SELECT sum("count") as "ok" FROM "gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'ok' AND "request" =~ /.*${system}*./ AND "loadGenerator"::tag =~ /^$load_generator$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null))

SELECT 100 * sum("ko") / sum("all")
FROM 
    (SELECT sum("count") as "all" FROM "gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'all' AND "request" =~ /.*${system}*./ AND "loadGenerator"::tag =~ /^$load_generator$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)),
    (SELECT sum("count") as "ko" FROM "gatling" WHERE ("status" = 'ko' AND "request" =~ /.*${system}*./ AND "loadGenerator"::tag =~ /^$load_generator$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null))

panels.description: Количество успешно обработанных запросов в секунду.
panels.title: RPS UC (OK)

targets.query:
SELECT sum("percentiles50")
FROM (
SELECT max("percentiles50") AS "percentiles50"
FROM "gatling" 
    WHERE ("group"::tag =~ /.*${system}.*/ AND "loadGenerator"::tag =~ /^$load_generator$/) AND $timeFilter
    GROUP BY time(10s), "group"::tag, "request"::tag fill(null)
)
GROUP BY time(10s), "group"::tag fill(null)

SELECT sum("percentiles75")
FROM (
SELECT max("percentiles75") AS "percentiles75"
FROM "gatling" 
    WHERE ("group"::tag =~ /.*${system}.*/ AND "loadGenerator"::tag =~ /^$load_generator$/) AND $timeFilter
    GROUP BY time(10s), "group"::tag, "request"::tag fill(null)
)
GROUP BY time(10s), "group"::tag fill(null)

SELECT sum("percentiles95")
FROM (
SELECT max("percentiles95") AS "percentiles95"
FROM "gatling" 
    WHERE ("group"::tag =~ /.*${system}.*/ AND "loadGenerator"::tag =~ /^$load_generator$/) AND $timeFilter
    GROUP BY time(10s), "group"::tag, "request"::tag fill(null)
)
GROUP BY time(10s), "group"::tag fill(null)

SELECT sum("percentiles99")
FROM (
SELECT max("percentiles99") AS "percentiles99"
FROM "gatling" 
    WHERE ("group"::tag =~ /.*${system}.*/ AND "loadGenerator"::tag =~ /^$load_generator$/) AND $timeFilter
    GROUP BY time(10s), "group"::tag, "request"::tag fill(null)
)
GROUP BY time(10s), "group"::tag fill(null)

SELECT sum("ok") + sum("ko") as "Total",
       sum("ok") as "OK",
       sum("ko") as "KO",
       100 * sum("ok") / (sum("ko") + sum("ok")) as "OK%",
       100 * sum("ko") / (sum("ko") + sum("ok")) as "KO%",
       (mean("TPS_OK") + mean("TPS_KO")) / (${send_interval}) as "TPS",
       min("Min") / 1000 as "Min",
       mean("50th pct") / 1000 as "50th pct",
       mean("75th pct") / 1000 as "75th pct",
       mean("95th pct") / 1000 as "95th pct",
       mean("99th pct") / 1000 as "99th pct",
       max("Max") / 1000 as "Max",
       mean("Mean") / 1000 as "Mean",
       mean("Std Dev") / 1000 as "Std Dev"
FROM
(
    SELECT
      mean("count") as "ok",
      mean("count") as "TPS_OK",
      min("min") as "Min",
      mean("percentiles50") as "50th pct",
      mean("percentiles75") as "75th pct",
      mean("percentiles95") as "95th pct",
      mean("percentiles99") as "99th pct",
      max("max") as "Max",
      mean("mean") as "Mean",
      mean("stdDev") as "Std Dev"
    FROM "gatling"
    WHERE ("status" = 'ok' AND "request" =~ /.*${system}.*/) AND $timeFilter
    GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
),
(
    SELECT
      mean("count") as "ko",
      mean("count") as "TPS_KO",
      min("min") as "Min",
      mean("percentiles50") as "50th pct",
      mean("percentiles75") as "75th pct",
      mean("percentiles95") as "95th pct",
      mean("percentiles99") as "99th pct",
      max("max") as "Max",
      mean("mean") as "Mean",
      mean("stdDev") as "Std Dev"
    FROM "gatling"
    WHERE ("status" = 'ko' AND "request" =~ /.*${system}.*/) AND $timeFilter
    GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
)
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY "request" fill(null)

panels.title: Summary UR

panels.description: Количество успешно обработанных запросов в секунду.
panels.title: RPS UR (OK)
